heading: HR01964
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT TO FURTHER REPAIR AND FORTIFY THE BRP SIERRA MADRE IN AYUNGIN SHOAL AND TO ENSURE THAT FUNDS FOR SUCH UNDERTAKING ARE AVAILABLE, SUFFICIENT AND ARE UTILIZED IN THE MOST EFFICIENT AND EFFECTIVE MANNER
status: Pending with the Committee on NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01964
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT TO FURTHER REPAIR AND FORTIFY THE BRP SIERRA MADRE IN AYUNGIN SHOAL AND TO ENSURE THAT FUNDS FOR SUCH UNDERTAKING ARE AVAILABLE, SUFFICIENT AND ARE UTILIZED IN THE MOST EFFICIENT AND EFFECTIVE MANNER
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-06-20
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY ON 2018-07-30
